timeline.bodyText: Why do you need these two methods? If I didn't overlook something, localize and getLocalizedProfileTypeKey are only called once.
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: Absolutely right. It is a developer's sin. Copy & paste from OHC SystemProfileFactory.
replies.author: cweitkamp
